gro.aire@ailua.haflu ailuA haflU sM aisenodnI ,atrakaJ        pohskroW tcejorP seitinemA pohskroW tcejorP seitinemA";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:9:"highlight";s:1:"0";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"100";s:12:"created_date";s:19:"2022-12-30 10:50:11";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2022-12-30 10:50:11";s:11:"modified_by";s:2:"18";s:7:"old_url";N;s:10:"majorEmail";s:20:"ulfah.aulia@eria.org";s:9:"education";N;s:10:"experience";N;s:12:"publications";N;s:6:"others";N;s:13:"presentations";N;s:7:"feature";N;s:11:"sub_experts";s:1:"1";s:15:"sub_dep_experts";N;s:13:"meta_keywords";N;s:16:"meta_description";N;s:5:"sc_id";s:1:"0";}i:3;O:8:"stdClass":46:{s:9:"short_des";N;s:10:"article_id";s:4:"7270";s:12:"article_type";s:6:"events";s:3:"uri";s:112:"intellectual-property-rights-seminar-on-branding-and-innovation---signing-ceremony-for-memorandum-of-cooperation";s:8:"pub_type";s:1:"3";s:5:"title";s:112:"Intellectual Property Rights Seminar on Branding and Innovation - Signing Ceremony for Memorandum of Cooperation";s:11:"posted_date";s:10:"2023-01-14";s:11:"posted_year";s:4:"2023";s:12:"posted_month";s:1:"1";s:7:"content";s:9451:"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
</head>
<body>
<p>The coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic has caused trade disruptions; a drop in foreign direct investment; and scarring effects on poverty, education, and women in many nations. However, it has also beneficial features. Asia has continued to produce and export during the pandemic. COVID-19 has boosted digitalisation, notably in information and communication technology (ICT). The adoption of ICT has boosted economic growth. As drastic transformation of business models due to such digitalisation, it is expected that distinguished businesses like e-commerce will be or are appearing.</p>
<p>Considering these social backgrounds, a branding strategy by utilizing IPR such as trademarks and designs is also crucial, so as to distinguish excellent goods and businesses from others appropriately. it will connect them to investment and industrial development in the country.</p>
<p>In this context, IPR including trademarks, and designs is a key to producing innovative and distinguished businesses from Cambodia.</p>
<p>Under the circumstance, MoC, JPO and ERIA have reached an understanding to need to strengthen technical cooperation on research in the field of IPR.</p>
<p>This ceremony will be held for the purpose of confirming mutual understanding and cooperations among MoC, JPO, and ERIA.</p>
<p>Further, IPR seminar will be held to utilize this opportunity of MOCs among MoC, MISTI, JPO, and ERIA for the purpose of enhancing the awareness of IPR in Cambodia.</p>
<h2 data-key="206" data-slate-fragment=""><span data-key="207">Event Details</span></h2>
<p data-key="206" data-slate-fragment=""><span data-key="207">Date: Tuesday, 24 January 2022<br />Time: 9 AM to 11:15 AM (Jakarta time, UTC+7)<br /></span></p>
</body>
</html>";s:10:"image_name";s:0:"";s:9:"video_url";s:0:"";s:4:"tags";s:0:"";s:6:"editor";s:0:"";s:6:"author";s:0:"";s:6:"doc_no";s:0:"";s:6:"period";s:0:"";s:14:"article_status";s:1:"0";s:10:"event_time";s:0:"";s:5:"venue";s:12:"Hybrid event";s:5:"major";s:0:"";s:16:"article_keywords";s:0:"";s:9:"organizer";s:0:"";s:12:"image_name_2";s:0:"";s:10:"start_date";s:10:"2023-01-24";s:8:"end_date";s:10:"0000-00-00";s:8:"keywords";s:3741:"Intellectual Property Rights Seminar on Branding and Innovation - Signing Ceremony for Memorandum of Cooperation Intellectual Property Rights Seminar on Branding and Innovation - Signing Ceremony for Memorandum of Cooperation The coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic has caused trade disruptions; a drop in foreign direct investment; and scarring effects on poverty, education, and women in many nations. However, it has also beneficial features. Asia has continued to produce and export during the pandemic. COVID-19 has boosted digitalisation, notably in information and communication technology (ICT). The adoption of ICT has boosted economic growth. As drastic transformation of business models due to such digitalisation, it is expected that distinguished businesses like e-commerce will be or are appearing.
Considering these social backgrounds, a branding strategy by utilizing IPR such as trademarks and designs is also crucial, so as to distinguish excellent goods and businesses from others appropriately. it will connect them to investment and industrial development in the country.
In this context, IPR including trademarks, and designs is a key to producing innovative and distinguished businesses from Cambodia.
Under the circumstance, MoC, JPO and ERIA have reached an understanding to need to strengthen technical cooperation on research in the field of IPR.
This ceremony will be held for the purpose of confirming mutual understanding and cooperations among MoC, JPO, and ERIA.
Further, IPR seminar will be held to utilize this opportunity of MOCs among MoC, MISTI, JPO, and ERIA for the purpose of enhancing the awareness of IPR in Cambodia.
Event Details
Date: Tuesday, 24 January 2022Time: 9 AM to 11:15 AM (Jakarta time, UTC+7)       Hybrid event  Ms Ulfa Rizkiana ulfa.rizkiana@eria.org   2023-01-24 0000-00-00 2023-01-24 24 January 2023 3202 yraunaJ 42 42-10-3202 00-00-0000 42-10-3202   gro.aire@anaikzir.aflu anaikziR aflU sM  tneve dirbyH       )7+CTU ,emit atrakaJ( MA 51:11 ot MA 9 :emiT2202 yraunaJ 42 ,yadseuT :etaD
sliateD tnevE
.aidobmaC ni RPI fo ssenerawa eht gnicnahne fo esoprup eht rof AIRE dna ,OPJ ,ITSIM ,CoM gnoma sCOM fo ytinutroppo siht ezilitu ot dleh eb lliw ranimes RPI ,rehtruF
.AIRE dna ,OPJ ,CoM gnoma snoitarepooc dna gnidnatsrednu lautum gnimrifnoc fo esoprup eht rof dleh eb lliw ynomerec sihT
.RPI fo dleif eht ni hcraeser no noitarepooc lacinhcet nehtgnerts ot deen ot gnidnatsrednu na dehcaer evah AIRE dna OPJ ,CoM ,ecnatsmucric eht rednU
.aidobmaC morf sessenisub dehsiugnitsid dna evitavonni gnicudorp ot yek a si sngised dna ,skramedart gnidulcni RPI ,txetnoc siht nI
.yrtnuoc eht ni tnempoleved lairtsudni dna tnemtsevni ot meht tcennoc lliw ti .yletairporppa srehto morf sessenisub dna sdoog tnellecxe hsiugnitsid ot sa os ,laicurc osla si sngised dna skramedart sa hcus RPI gnizilitu yb ygetarts gnidnarb a ,sdnuorgkcab laicos eseht gniredisnoC
.gniraeppa era ro eb lliw ecremmoc-e ekil sessenisub dehsiugnitsid taht detcepxe si ti ,noitasilatigid hcus ot eud sledom ssenisub fo noitamrofsnart citsard sA .htworg cimonoce detsoob sah TCI fo noitpoda ehT .)TCI( ygolonhcet noitacinummoc dna noitamrofni ni ylbaton ,noitasilatigid detsoob sah 91-DIVOC .cimednap eht gnirud tropxe dna ecudorp ot deunitnoc sah aisA .serutaef laicifeneb osla sah ti ,revewoH .snoitan ynam ni nemow dna ,noitacude ,ytrevop no stceffe gnirracs dna ;tnemtsevni tcerid ngierof ni pord a ;snoitpursid edart desuac sah cimednap )91-DIVOC( esaesid surivanoroc ehT noitarepooC fo mudnaromeM rof ynomereC gningiS - noitavonnI dna gnidnarB no ranimeS sthgiR ytreporP lautcelletnI noitarepooC fo mudnaromeM rof ynomereC gningiS - noitavonnI dna gnidnarB no ranimeS sthgiR ytreporP lautcelletnI";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:9:"highlight";s:1:"0";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"100";s:12:"created_date";s:19:"2022-12-27 11:39:43";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2022-12-27 11:40:00";s:11:"modified_by";s:2:"13";s:7:"old_url";s:0:"";s:10:"majorEmail";s:22:"ulfa.rizkiana@eria.org";s:9:"education";N;s:10:"experience";N;s:12:"publications";N;s:6:"others";N;s:13:"presentations";s:5:"18, 1";s:7:"feature";N;s:11:"sub_experts";s:1:"1";s:15:"sub_dep_experts";N;s:13:"meta_keywords";N;s:16:"meta_description";N;s:5:"sc_id";s:1:"0";}}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2023-01-18 09:16:23.873693";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
